body_html: I'm far from being an expert on cmake, but the traditional way of doing things in FindModule.cmake (as I see it) is to provide a list of libraries in NAME_LIBRARIES and a list of include directories in NAME_INCLUDE_DIRS. The FindModule.cmake is not supposed to build anything nor create any target.

body: I'm far from being an expert on cmake, but the traditional way of doing things in FindModule.cmake (as I see it) is to provide a list of libraries in NAME_LIBRARIES and a list of include directories in NAME_INCLUDE_DIRS. The FindModule.cmake is not supposed to build anything nor create any target.
